mapper.sql: eid, ename, esex, ebirth, eidcard, ephone, email, edeptno, epostno, etime, estatus, epassword
mapper.insert:
insert into employee
eid,
ename,
esex,
ebirth,
eidcard,
ephone,
email,
edeptno,
epostno,
etime,
estatus,
epassword,

mapper.update:
update employee
ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
esex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ebirth = #{ebirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eidcard = #{eidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ephone = #{ephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edeptno = #{edeptno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
epostno = #{epostno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
estatus = #{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
epassword = #{epassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee set ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, esex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ebirth = #{ebirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eidcard = #{eidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ephone = #{ephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edeptno = #{edeptno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, epostno = #{epostno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, estatus = #{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, epassword = #{epassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
